derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: coined in French from Greek hudōr 'water'

entry.def: A hydrate is a chemical compound that contains water.
If a substance hydrates your skin, it makes it softer and less dry.

example.ex: After-sun products will cool and hydrate your skin.
example.tran: 晒后护肤品会清凉肌肤并为其补水。

means.word_mean: 1. any compound that contains water of crystallization
1. supply water or liquid to in order to maintain a healthy balance;
2. become hydrated and combine with water
3. cause to be hydrated; add water or moisture to;

de去掉+hydrate[n.水化物 v.水化]→去掉水
